author: RTÉ News
title: What are the lockdown measures the UK has introduced?
description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson put the country on lockdown yesterday evening as he outlined strict new measures to curb the spread of Covid-19. Mr Johnson ordered people to only leave the house for a few specific reasons.
content:
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson put his country on lockdown yesterday evening as he outlined strict new measures to curb the spread of Covid-19.
Mr Johnson ordered people to only leave the house for a few specific reasons.
